Merced Co. residents concerned about COVID-19 and how to keep family and loved ones safe can join the Dept. of Public Health tomorrow Oct. 29th LIVE from 5:30p to 6:30p and get answers to their health questions. 

Participate by using the link below:
https://t.co/3mlZKwruew https://t.co/3Cl7NlJS3Y
As Halloween approaches, it's important to take great care to prevent the spread of COVID-19. Follow these guidelines to keep yourself and others safe. #WearAMask https://t.co/obxvce7Mnl

Today we learned Madera County will stay in the 'Purple Tier' for the time being. If you have questions about that or anything else related to COVID-19, the Madera Co. Dept. of Public Health will hold a Facebook Live event to answer your questions. See below for more info: https://t.co/3ZmU4dc9fo
